settings.heading: Features
settings.content:
• Equipped with a highly accurate optical laser sensor to detect the status of your garage door (open or closed)
  • Compatible with SmartThings, Alexa, and Home Assistant
  • Option to incorporate a wired sensor to enhance precision (not required, sold separately)
  • Cut costs by upgrading your existing setup
  • Connects effortlessly via Wi-Fi, eliminating the need for a separate hub
  • Provides both audible and visual alerts prior to closing
  • Access all functionalities without any recurring monthly fees
  • Operates without the need for batteries

settings.heading: Related products
Make Your Old Garage Door Opener Smart

settings.text:
Konnected Garage Door Opener retrofits old wired garage door openers and brings them to the 21st century - without monthly fees.

After easy installation, users enjoy remote access to their garage door opener from anywhere via their favorite smart home platforms like SmartThings, Alexa, and Home Assistant.

settings.title: Check the Learn Button
settings.text: Works with garage door openers that have any color Learn Button except for yellow, which includes Chamberlain/LiftMaster/Craftsman openers with purple, red, green learn buttons, and other brands as long as a wall push button or connection is available.

settings.title: Identify the Wired Opener Button
settings.text: Konnected’s Garage Door Opener works with most garage doors with a wired push-button mounted on the wall, a simple “dry-contact” switch. This includes nearly all garage door openers made before 2015 and many newer ones except those with Security+ 2.0 buttons.

settings.title: Get an Adapter for Yellow-Button Openers
settings.text: If your garage door opener features a yellow learn button, it means it features Security+ 2.0. In order for Konnected Garage Door Opener to work with your Security+ 2.0. device, you'll need to grab one of the dry contact adapters from ismartgate or Garadget.

settings.title: Measure the Garage's Height
settings.text: The optical laser sensor works most reliably when the ceiling is less than ~5-6 feet from the rolled-up garage door. In typical homes with a standard 7ft garage door and ~8-13ft ceilings, this is no problem. We suggest adding a wired sensor to ensure accuracy if your garage ceiling exceeds those numbers.

settings.title: Verify Your Garage Door Opener's Compatibility

settings.heading: Smart Upgrade to an Old Garage Door Opener
Remote Access to Your Garage Door
settings.subheading: Stay in Control Wherever You Are

settings.heading: Built-In Optical Laser Sensor

settings.text:
• Highly accurate time-of-flight range sensor
  • Measures fixed distance between rolled-up garage door and the sensor to detect if the garage door is open
  • Works seamlessly day & night
  • No extra accessories required
  • Monitors garage door status 24/7

settings.title: Built-In Optical Laser Sensor Only
settings.text:
Included with every Smart Garage Door purchase.

Best for:

  • most garages with ceilings at ~8-13ft
  • users who want the simplest installation & most common setup

settings.title: Built-In Optical Laser Sensor + Wired Sensor
settings.text:
Wired sensor sold separately.

Best for:

  • tall garages with ceilings higher than 13ft
  • users seeking an extra layer of accuracy in case the optical laser sensor gets obstructed (e.g., by a spider web or dust)

settings.question: Do you charge any monthly fees?
settings.answer: No, we do not charge any required monthl

settings.question: Do you charge any monthly fees?
Does this garage door opener work with SmartThings or Alexa?
Will my existing door openers (car, wall, and outside keypad) still work?

settings.heading: Where can I read the manual for the Konnected Garage Door Opener?
settings.row_content: You can view all of the Garage Door Opener support assets here.

settings.heading: Will my existing door openers (car, wall, and outside keypad) still work?
settings.row_content: Yes, of course, they will still work. Konnected only makes your garage smarter; it doesn't take away any existing features.

settings.heading: What if I have multiple garage doors?
settings.row_content: If you have more than one garage door, you'll need one Konnected Garage Door Opener per garage door.

settings.heading: Does this Garage Door Opener blink before closing?
settings.row_content:
Yes, this smart garage door opener gives you visual (blinking) and audible (beeping) warnings for ~5 seconds before the door starts to close. 

Please note that the visual/audible warnings DO NOT occur when the garage door is closed using your wall button or pre-existing remote.

settings.heading: Does it meet U.S. safety regulations?
settings.row_content:
Yes, our product meets the U.S. safety regulations found in this article.

Our product was designed with safety in mind and can be sold worldwide. The product features an audible (beeping) and visual (blinking light) warning for ~5 seconds before closing the garage - required by U.S. safety regulations.

settings.heading: Should I get a wired sensor for my Smart Garage Door Opener?
settings.row_content:
There are three main reasons to add an optional heavy-duty wired sensor to your Konnected Garage Door Opener: 

  • your garage's ceiling is very high (more than 8-10 ft)
  • you want an extra layer of accuracy in case the optical sensor gets obstructed (e.g., by dust or spider web)
  • you trust wired sensors more than any other sensors

settings.heading: How is it powered?
settings.row_content: It's powered by a 12V power adapter (included) which plugs into a standard power outlet. Usually, the garage door opener receives power from a power outlet on the garage ceiling. No batteries required.

settings.heading: Do you charge any monthly fees?
settings.row_content: There are no ongoing fees to use Konnected's Garage Door Opener. In the future, we may introduce optional premium features for a fee.

settings.heading: Does this garage door opener work with SmartThings or Alexa?
settings.row_content: Yes, this product is fully integrated with SmartThings, Alexa, and Home Assistant (Home Assistant works through ESPHome).

settings.heading: Are there more integrations coming in the future?
settings.row_content: Currently, Konnected Garage Door Opener works with SmartThings, Alexa, and Home Assistant (Home Assistant through ESPHome). In the future, we're planning on expanding the integrations list.

settings.heading: Is there a Quick Start Guide?
settings.row_content: Yes, there is and you can view it here.
